alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Mahaska; Marion; Marshall; Polk; Poweshiek; Story; Wapello; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:53AM CST until December 28 at 11:00AM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Light Wintry Mix from Central Into Northern and Eastern Iowa Today... .Light snow will begin early this morning, then change to light freezing rain or a wintry mix by the morning commute. Slick roads and travel impacts will be possible at times. In central Iowa temperatures will rise above freezing before noon, but in northeastern Iowa a light wintry mix may persist until this evening due to cooler temperatures. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 11 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of less then an inch and a light glaze of ice. * WHERE...Parts of central and east central Iowa, including much of the Des Moines metro area. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 11 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Potential for slippery road conditions and restrictions to visibility at times. The hazardous conditions may impact travel during the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
